name: My Little Hamster
description:
[English below]

My Little Hamster são dois minigames desenvolvidos durante o Bootcamp Kickstart da Tapps.

A proposta do projeto foi desenvolver dois minigames no estilo "karting" e "spooky", usando de referência o jogo My Boo 2 da Tapps.

Projeto desenvolvido entre dos dias 1º à 19 de Maio de 2022.


TUTORIAL:

Hamster Ball:
Passar o mouse em cima das setas para se movimentar.

Spooky Maze:
Clicar na tela com o mouse para se movimentar.

CREDITS:

Game Artists:
Suelem Suemi
Enzo Orion
Fabrício Vinícius (Tech Artist)

Game Desginers:
Candida Vieira
Felipe Vergara

Game Developers:
Andressa Duarte
Caio Sanches
Alexandre Rodrigues

Audio:
Gustavo Sperling

QA:
Babi Freitas


[English]

My Little Hamster are two minigames developed during Tapps' Bootcamp Kickstart.

The project's proposal was to develop two minigames in the "karting" and "spooky" style, using Tapps' My Boo 2 as a reference.

Project developed between the 1st to the 19th of May 2022.

TUTORIAL:

Hamster Ball:
Hover the mouse over the arrows to move.

Spooky Maze:
Click on the screen with the mouse to move.
